title: Vegetarian split pea soup
ingredients: ['250g split green peas', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 white onion, chopped', '2 carrots, sliced', '1 stick celery, chopped', '1 bay leaf', '1.5L vegetable stock', '300ml water', 'salt and pepper, to taste', 'chopped fresh thyme, to taste', 'chopped fresh parsley, to taste', 'chopped fresh chives, to taste']
